summary:
Features, Full Physics, Fit these outfits perfectly to all UNP bodies, all Sevenbase, all UNPB, Demonphet, Seraphim, Top Model, DG, and many many more.
Everybody, Everytime, and Everywhere in game with Racemenu Morph Support. Features Outfits and Armors for Skyrim, DawnGaurd, and DragonBorn.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69886-0-1442798243.jpg[/img]
[size=1]photo by s666[/size]

[/size][center][size=5][b]Skyrim Enhanced -High Polygons- for UUNP Bodyslide 

[/b][/size][size=3][u][color=#0066cc]SKYRIM Enhanced -High Polygons- CBBE and bodyslide support[/color][/u] was designed by "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3516025][u][color=#0066cc][size=5]s666[/size][/color][/u][/url]"[/size]

[b]The meshes here are Re-Mastered by "[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Gamefever[/size][/color][/u][/url][b]" to give the end-user a form fitting outfit for all body types in the UUNP System.

Tools used by "[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc]gamefever[/color][/u][/url] [b]"
[/b][size=3]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/size][b] by [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Caliente[/size][/color][/u][/url] [b]and [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Ousnius[/size][/color][/u][/url] [b]
Blender
Nifskope
Meshrigger[/b][size=4]
[/size][/center][size=4]
[/size]I advise you the downloader to not use the Dresses and Robes.
They have issues with weight painting.
Also I think the Scaled Armor did as well.
[size=4]
[/size][size=4][u]
Requirements

[/u][/size][size=3]Bodyslide Outfit Studio 2.0 [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?
->Be sure to install the UUNP Racemenu Option[/size][size=3]
XPMS Extended (for Morph menu in game and skeleton of course) [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?[/size]
[size=3]
[b][u]Recommended
[/u][/b][size=2]RaceMenu: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/
[/u][/url]HDT Physics Extensions [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/[/u][/url]

[/size][size=4][b][u]
Installation
[/u][/b]
Mod Organizer or Simply unpack the contents to your Skyrim\Data Folder
[u]
[/u][/size][size=3]
[b][u]Known Issue's
[/u][/b]-Nexus Mod Manager
>Will take hours and hours to install the many files in this Mod.
-Real Time Morphs with this many Polygons are an issue.  That Mod Authors of Racemenu and Bodyslide are seeking to address in the future.
-Ousnius and other mod makers are seeking some answer's on how to address the Racemenu Morph capacity for all end-users
-Robes and Dresses have odd seam between legs, that's a vanilla game issue Im afraid, so little I can do to fix that.
-Yarl Clothes, there is an update that fixes the YarlClothes Texture Pathing issue, please use the update file to fix this.


[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3516025][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]s666[/size][/color][/u][/url] for High Polygon versions of Skyrim Armors and Outfits.
